Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2011 12:03PM tcplk wrote: I had Stage 0 (no tumor) DCIS in 2006, and opted for a mastectomy after no clear margins were attained in the lumpectomy procedure.  The description of the SNB injections being like hot pokers perfectly applies to all 4 of mine and what I experienced.  I was not offered any anti-numbing cream, and it was done an hour or two prior to anethesia being given to me for the mastectomy surgery.  The nurse just told me to hold onto her hand tight.  I cried my eyes out, and so was very upset going into surgery.  There seems to be no predicting who will have mild stinging and who will have excruciating pain from these radio-active injections.
Posts.Title: Radioactive Injection into Nipple NOT TERRIBLE waynesgirl50 Motherofall6
